scripts.docker:stop: docker stop backend_crawler_1 backend_graphql-engine_1 backend_postgres_1 backend_substrate-node_1
scripts.docker:postgres:backup: docker exec -t backend_postgres_1 pg_dump reefexplorer -c -U reefexplorer > reefexplorer_dump.sql
scripts.docker:postgres:backup:contracts: docker exec -t backend_postgres_1 pg_dump reefexplorer -U reefexplorer -a -t contract > contracts.sql
scripts.docker:postgres:restore: docker stop backend_crawler_1 && cat reefexplorer_dump.sql | docker exec -i backend_postgres_1 psql -U reefexplorer -d reefexplorer && docker restart backend_postgres_1 && docker start backend_crawler_1
